member.name: T:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters
member.summary: DosBox command line parameters see: DosBox Wiki: Usage

member.name: M:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.#ctor
member.summary: Create new instance to DosBoxParameters with parameters for DosBox application

member.name: M:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create new instance to DosBoxParameters with parameters for DosBox application

summary.para: If name is a directory, DOSBox will mount the specified directory as the C drive.
If name is an executable, DOSBox will mount the directory of name as the C drive, and start executing name.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Exit
member.summary: DOSBox will close itself when the DOS application name ends.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Commands
member.summary: Runs the specified command before running name. Multiple commands can be specified. Each command should start with -c though. A command can be: an Internal Program, a DOS command or an executable on a mounted drive.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Fullscreen
member.summary: Starts DOSBox in fullscreen mode.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.UserConf
member.summary: Load the configuration from the user's profile or home directory. This is the default behavior, so this switch is useful when using -conf, below.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Configurations
member.summary: Load the config file specified in configfilelocation. Useful for specifying particular options for specific games. If used after -userconf, or if you use multiple -conf switches, options present in multiple configs will be overwritten by the last, except for autoexec entries, which will be appended in order.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Languages
member.summary: Start DOSBox using the language string specified in languagefilelocation.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Machine
member.summary: Setup DOSBox to emulate a specific type of machine. Valid choices are: hercules, cga, ega, pcjr, tandy, svga_s3 (default) as well as the additional svga chipsets listed in the DOSBox configuration file. The machinetype affects the video card and the available sound cards.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.NoConsole
member.summary: Start DOSBox without showing the console window, output will be redirected to stdout.txt and stderr.txt. This is useful if DOSBox crashes, since the error messages stored in stdout.txt and stderr.txt may help the developers fixing the problem.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.StartMapper
member.summary: Enter the mapper directly on startup. Useful for people with keyboard or joystick problems.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.NoAutoexec
member.summary: Skips the [autoexec] section of the loaded configuration file.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.SecureMode
member.summary: Same as -noautoexec, but adds config.com -securemode at the bottom of AUTOEXEC.BAT (which in turn disables any changes to how the drives are mounted inside DOSBox).

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Scaler
member.summary: Uses the scaler specified by "scaler". See the DOSBox configuration file for the available scalers.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.ForceScaler
member.summary: Similar to the -scaler parameter, but tries to force usage of the specified scaler even if it might not fit.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Version
member.summary: output version information and exit. (see stdout.txt) Useful for frontends.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.EditConfs
member.summary: calls program with as first parameter the configuration file. You can specify this command more than once. In this case it will move to second program if the first one fails to start.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.OpenCaptures
member.summary: calls program with as first parameter the location of the captures folder.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.PrintConf
member.summary: prints the location of the default configuration file.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.ResetConf
member.summary: removes the default configuration file.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.ResetMapper
member.summary: removes the mapperfile used by the default clean configuration file.

member.name: P:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Socket
member.summary: passes the socket number to the nullmodem emulation.

member.name: M:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Create
member.summary: Create a new DosBox Parameters object
member.returns: New DosBox Parameters object

member.name: M:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new DosBox Parameters object
member.returns: New DosBox Parameters object

member.name: M:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.AddName(System.String)
member.summary: Add parameter name
member.param: If name is a directory, DOSBox will mount the specified directory as the C drive. If name is an executable, DOSBox will mount the directory of name as the C drive, and start executing name.
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.name: M:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.AddExit
member.summary: Add parameter: -exit DOSBox will close itself when the DOS application name ends.
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.name: M:TioRAC.DosBox.Process.DosBoxParameters.AddCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Add single parameter command
member.param: Runs the specified command before running name.
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add parameter: -fullscreen Starts DOSBox in fullscreen mode.
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add parameter: -userconf -Load the configuration from the user's profile or home directory.
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add single parameter conf
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add single parameter lang
member.param: Start DOSBox using the language string specified
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add parameter: -machine Setup DOSBox to emulate a specific type of machine.
member.param: Valid choices are: hercules, cga, ega, pcjr, tandy, svga_s3 (default)
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add parameter: -noconsole Start DOSBox without showing the console window (Windows Only).
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add parameter: -startmapper Enter the mapper directly on startup.
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add parameter: -noautoexec Skips the [autoexec] section of the loaded configuration file.
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add parameter: -securemode Same as -noautoexec, but adds config.com -securemode at the bottom of AUTOEXEC.BAT
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter

member.summary: Add parameter: -forcescaler Similar to the -scaler parameter, but tries to force usage of the specified scaler even if it might not fit.
member.returns: DosBox parameters to add another parameter
